title: Android 10 Security July 5, 2020 broke Wi-Fi calling. Error "Turn off airplane mode ..." ANY FIXES?
content:
Project Fi cellular reception is almost non-existent here, hence the need for Wi-Fi calling and no need to have cellular turned on draining the battery. Wi-Fi calling, while cellular was turned off via airplane mode, worked before the last update (July 5, 2020). I could call and receive calls via Wi-Fi even while in airplane mode.

I checked many many settings. I read a bunch of help tips which didn't help. 

Does anybody have a solution?
